Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.ClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ClientHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
This class represents a ClientHandler. It is a thread instantiated by the server when a clients connects to it. It will be in charge of exchanging messages with the client.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientHandler

      public ClientHandler​(java.net.Socket socket, Server server)
      Constructor ClientHandler creates a new ClientHandler instance.
      Parameters:
      socket - is the socket used for exchanging messages.
      server - is the ClientHandler's server.

  • Method Details

    • setup

      public void setup​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> message)
      This method is called when a client sends a setup message. It will check if the client username is available and preferred number of players. If the infos sent by the client are "ok" it will add the username to the list and assigns the client a game.
      Parameters:
      message - is a map which represents the client's message.

    • clientPingInitiate

      private void clientPingInitiate()
      This method initiates the ClientPing and sets a timeout on the socket.

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      This method returns if the ClientHandler is active.
      Returns:
      if the ClientHandler is active.

    • actionHandler

      public void actionHandler​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> map)
      This method is used when the ClientHandler receives a message from the client, in order to call the right method.
      Parameters:
      map - is the message received from the client.

    • makeAction

      public void makeAction​(Message message)
      This method is used when a client sends a move message to the server. The message will be then sent to the GameHandler.
      Parameters:
      message - is the message received from the client.

    • setGame

      public void setGame​(GameHandler game)
      This method assigns a game to the client.
      Parameters:
      game - is the game assigned to the client.

    • send

      public void send​(java.lang.String message)
      This method sends a message to the client.
      Parameters:
      message - is the message that will be sent to the client.

    • getPrefNumber

      public int getPrefNumber()
      This method returns the client's preferred number of players.
      Returns:
      the client's preferred number of players.

    • getName

      public java.lang.String getName()
      This method returns the client's name.
      Returns:
      the client's name.

    • getGame

      public GameHandler getGame()
      This method returns the client's game.
      Returns:
      the client's game.

    • readMessage

      public void readMessage() throws java.io.IOException
      This method reads a message from socket.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if the connection was interrupted.

    • close

      public void close()
      This method closes the socket.

    • removeClient

      public void removeClient()
      This method removes the client from the server's list.

      Thread run method that will run as long as the thread is active.
